column2: Easily add custom folding and page-flipping transitions to UIViews and UIViewControllers

column5: message
Minor tweaks to adjust sample app to iOS 7.
update README
iPhone 5 support

Merge pull request #9 from meinside/master

fixed bugs in the popToRootViewControllerWithXXXStyle: functions

fixed a bug in popToRootViewControllerWithFoldStyle: function

(was directing to a wrong view controller, causing awkward transition)

fixed a bug in popToRootViewControllerWithFlipStyle: function

(was directing to a wrong view controller, causing awkward transition)
minor cleanup

Merge pull request #7 from meinside/master

added UINavigationController category functions
added 'popToRootViewController*' to MPFoldTransition/MPFlipTransition's UINavigationController category
add Requirements section to README

Fix bug when modally presenting a UINavigationController (which unlike other UIViewController classes already includes room within its bounds for the status bar).
This fixes Issue #6: When presenting a NavigationController, the snapshot image is incorrect.
Add support section to README (courtesy of Matt Gemmell)
Slightly darken the end point (light end) of the lower fold shadow gradient (non-cubic mode)
New icons for demo app (showing gradient shadows)
Use lighter gray for border in demo app
update images to show gradient shadows
update README image
Switch to gradient shadows for fold transition
switch to gradient (instead of solid) shadows for fold
Add link to MPFlipViewController project

Merge pull request #5 from cbowns/859c1f25de6bc3b9aa80235e15f425092d9bfb3a

Deselect the tableview cell after selection.
Deselect the tableview cell after it's selected.

Separate animation parts into separate methods and add ability to start animation from any position (e.g. if user were panning the page flip and then released the page- we would either need to animate to completion or fallback to initial position)
Separate out and expose method to build layers for the flip animation
Switch default mode back to fold
bump version to 1.1.4
Optimization: use source view instead of rendering facing Page, and where possible use destination view instead of rendering reveal Page (reduces render count from 4 to 2 or 3)
Set initial selected transition mode (flip or fold) from code (simplifies testing a particular mode)
Bump version to 1.1.3
Use 60 FPS for keyframes (used for sine wave timing curves for shadow animations)

Rearrange sublayers at midpoint of animation without implicit animation (saves an off-screen rendering pass).  Also, remove/add covered page shadow layers in addition to flipping page layers.  Pre-rotate back page layer prior to adding.
Update to new flip images showing gradient shadow layer on flipping page
Gradient shadow layer for crease effect on flipping page (replaces simple layer)
Fix background colors
Update README
Put a border around the #'d view in the sample app

Removed covered page shadows (and their animations) for reverse perspective- with page opening inward we're not doing a realistic animation any more, and the shadow didn't really make sense and distracted from the effect.

Reduce default covered page shadow opacity to 0.333 (Now that we're animating this shadow along cosine/sine curves, the darker shadow lingers longer - e.g. 2/3 through page flip up we're still at cos(60Â°) = 0.5 of max opacity, so we don't need as dark of a shadow.)
Use keyframes to animate covered page shadows along cosine/sine curves (to be proportional to the width of the covering page at the corresponding point in the page-flip animation).
Add flip images to README
Begin rename to MPTransition, update README and other docs
fix style comments
Rename flip styles (inward -> reverse perspective)
Add new flip style: Inward
Add properties to set shadow color and opacity on flip transitions
Use flip styles for modal and push transitions.  Removed segues from storyboards (because I want to dynamically switch between fold & flip transitions based on user selection).
Flip Storyboard segue classes
Initial commit of UI for incorporating flip transitions into sample app (still need to add segues for modal and nav push via flip)
Fix bug in bit flipping inline function
Initial commit of flip transaction classes
ignore
ignore breakpoints
Ability to set custom m34 (perspective) on transition
Correct Copyright in headers
Introduce more generic superclass MPTransition for MPFoldTransition
Add shadowOpacity (maximum) and shadowColor as properties to allow customizatio
add line breaks to README markdown
add images to README, take 2 (use markdown syntax)
Add images to README
Tweak Icons
update TODO list
ignore Xcode user metadata
Shadow layers need to be inset 1 point to account for parent's transparent borders for edge antialiasing
update README, again
update README
Initial commit
